GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.4.220
GSD.description:
crypto: cavium - prevent integer overflow loading firmware

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 584561e94260268abe1c83e00d9c205565cb7bc5, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit 9e2c7d99941d000a36f68a3594cec27a1bbea274. For more details please see the references link.
